# cgContext

**Instance Property**

The underlying Core Graphics context.

## Declaration

```swift
var cgContext: CGContext { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to gain access to the underlying Core Graphics context when you need more drawing functionality than is offered by UIKit and `UIGraphicsRendererContext`.

For an example of how and when to use the Core Graphics context in an image renderer, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsImageRenderer#Using-Core-Graphics-rendering-functions] in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsImageRenderer].

## Getting the drawing context

- **format**: The format used to create the associated graphics renderer.
